embed.description: Latest update: Hi everyone! I'm going for some kind of Bard Elderwood revisit, with a touch of Ivern style. Instead of his face, a hen will be nesting and lots of tiny chicks will be starring as Meeps. Still a lot to figure out but it should be fun!

replies.body: His face being a hole with a bird nest in it is extremely creative, one of the best skin concepts I've seen for Bard here.
This is what riot needs to be making, instead of giving lux her 22nd skin

{{champion:432}} I definitely like this skin, but I don't like that the color scheme is so similar to almost all the other bard skins. It makes this skin feel less special.{{champion:432}}

Awesome concept and quality.
Love this idea.  I'd buy it!  I have to admit.  I was hoping all of the chimes would be eggs.  Feathers are good too though.
nice idea! I hope this wins!

Oh. My. God. This is all I've ever wanted from a Bard skin. As someone who has devoted over 400k mastery points to Bard, I have to say, this is the greatest piece of ART I've ever seen. I want it, I need it! The design is genius, the concept, the execution, everything about it is everything I'd want out of a Bard skin. This needs to become a reality, Riot get your hands of Rakans pink hair dye and start working on this masterpiece. 

Love it{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
